abstract.para: &product; is a highly scalable, high performance open-source operating system designed to utilize the power of parallel computing for modeling, simulation and advanced analytics workloads.

sect1.title: Provides
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; provides tools and libraries related to High Performance Computing. This includes:

listitem.para: A tool for discovering the machine hardware topology
A tool for monitoring memory errors
A tool for determining the CPU model and its capabilities (x86-64 only)
User-extensible heap manager capable of distinguishing between different kinds of memory (x86-64 only)
Serial and parallel computational libraries providing the common standards BLAS, LAPACK, ...
Serial and parallel libraries for the HDF5 file format

sect1.title: Hardware Platform Support
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; is available for the Intel 64/AMD64 (x86-64) and AArch64 platforms.

sect1.title: Support and Life Cycle
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; is supported throughout the life cycle of &slea; &this-version;. ESPOS (Extended Service Overlap Support) as well as Long Term Support Service are also available for this product. Any release package is fully maintained and supported until the availability of the next release.
For more information, see the Support Policy page .
